text: It will be great to get with the HubSpot CLI a diff to have differences between a local file and a portal one, like `hs diff local_x portal_x` to have differences between two files or two folders... Just an idea. I known how apply ideas can take a long time...

I'm new to HubSpot and I've been testing the Tailwind theme from ozguruysal, but when I create a module locally and it I want to preview it, the tailwind-css isn't included

When I add the module on a page or previewing that page, the css is included as intended. Is it possible to make the tailwind-css be included in a module-preview?

The first image show how it looks in the module-preview and the second one is the preview of an page when using the module
I guess I somehow have to include the global css file in the module to make this work since the module preview only shows the module's css when previewing a module
